TableSpec.Name: Constituent Photo Analysis
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about analyzed constituent photos.
TableSpec.Author: Blackbaud Demo

EnumField.Name: PREDICTEDGENDERCODE
EnumField.Description: The predicted gender of the constituent.

NumberField.Name: ESTIMATEDAGE
NumberField.Description: The estimated age of the constituent.

DecimalField.Name: ANGERRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of anger.

DecimalField.Name: CONTEMPTRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of contempt.

DecimalField.Name: DISGUSTRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of disgust.

DecimalField.Name: FEARRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of fear.

DecimalField.Name: HAPPINESSRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of happiness.

DecimalField.Name: NEUTRALRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has a neutral expression.

DecimalField.Name: SADNESSRATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of sadness.

DecimalField.Name: SURPRISERATING
DecimalField.Description: The estimated confidence (0-1) that the person in the photo has an expression of surprise.
